text: Poison ivy! A firm hired by Vote Leave has been *handed* a £400,000 coronavirus contract that "may require data from “social media, utility providers, telecom bills & credit rating agencies”. Details on what the firm will actually DO have been withheld. https://t.co/36rT0om7Bp
